source: United Way Miami / Broward / Palm Beach

resources.name: Mission United Miami
resources.description: Mission United connects military-connected individuals to services and resources. The program helps veterans identify goals and take meaningful steps toward long-term self-sufficiency, whether transitioning from military to civilian life, seeking financial stability, or navigating community resources.
resources.eligibility: Veterans, active military, National Guard, Reservists, and their families in Miami-Dade County.

resources.name: Mission United Broward
resources.description: Mission United Broward provides comprehensive support for veterans and military families including employment assistance, housing services, and connection to community resources.
resources.eligibility: Veterans and military families in Broward County.

resources.name: Mission United Palm Beach County
resources.description: Mission United Palm Beach County connects veterans to career training, employment assistance, emergency financial aid, and community resources to support their transition and well-being.
resources.eligibility: Veterans and military families in Palm Beach County.
